choices.name: A Change of Circumstance
choices.description: PC of your choice gains or loses Position or Effect.

choices.name: A Taste of Indulgence
choices.description: PC of your choice instantly relieves 2 stress.

choices.name: Fortune Favors the Bold
choices.description: PC of your choice gains a critical success or failure.

choices.name: A Taste of Indulgence 2
choices.description: PC of your choice instantly relieves 4 Stress or reduces the level of Harm.

choices.name: Gluttonous Indulgence
choices.description: PC of your choice instantly relieves ALL Stress or reduces ALL levels of Harm.

choices.name: A Twist of Fate
choices.description: Introduce an element that changes the outcome of a Score.(GMâ€™ s discretion)
